Name: Fluff
Notes: A large flower that the player can glide with by grabbing it. It gets pushed by wind streams (FluffWind).

SW_A.Description: Gets activated when the player rides this specific Fluff Flower. Gets deactivated again if the player does not ride it anymore.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene. Its special cutscene nerve causes it to grow from the ground.
